::Zardus::

Zardus nods. "Excellent."

He frowns, looking the bot over. "You can join, of course. But have 
you been on this planet for long?"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Composer::
> 
>       Composer found Zardus pretty darn scary-looking, someone you 
didn't
> want to mess with.
> 
>        "Ah, it's a pleasure to finally meet you, Zardus.  Like 
Astral here
> said, I'd like to join.  I promise to be eternally loyal to you and 
the
> Alliance," Composer said, forgetting his true mission.
